summary: This Mod will bring you a High Quality 2K Set of Unique Weapons
descriptionHtml:
Inspired by the Game from Marvel Games - Deadpool !
 

This Mod will bring you a High Quality 2k Set of 5 Weapons from the Game Deadpool !

What is included - 

You will get two different type of Swords !

You will get a Dagger and a Knife !

You will get a Warhammer which comes in different Variations. 
This means you can choose if you want to use the Hammer as a Mace,Sword or as the Original Warhammer it is supposed to be ! I made three variations because each of it has different kill moves ! So you can enjoy the Weapon in more ways ! Just take a look at the Screenshots ! Of course I have made small changes to the look of the weapons to match them more into the world of Skyrim to give them the Realistic look for Skyrim Feeling ! 

All Weapons can be crafted at any Forge if you bring the Materials ! 

All Weapons have a Resolution of 2048x2048 HD !
Also all the Weapon Stats are not overpowered !


PLEASE TAKE A MOMENT TO ENDORSE THIS MOD !



If you want to boost your Character with all the Smithing Items and more just take a look at my other Character Builder Mod if you want to instantly Smith this Weapon Set at any Forge !

Take a look here:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32465/?

Also Check out my other Mods !

I wish you a nice gaming experience !



Credits to Nexus and Marvel Games Deadpool to inspire me to make this Weapon Set !

How to Install !

Simply drop the Data Folder into your Skyrim Directory - Manual Install only !

Thank you !
author: HXP

files.name: Dead Pool High Quality 2K Unique Weapons Set
